condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Les acteurs clés de la réponse humanitaire au Niger ont des capacités accrues pour l'analyse multisectorielle, la planification, la préparation et la réponse pour assurer la prise en charge en biens non alimentaires des enfants vulnérables victimes des déplacements forcés et des catastrophes naturelles.

description.narrative: Worsening security situation, scale of humanitarian needs, and diminished humanitarian access in Tillaberi, Tahoua and Diffa created challenges in delivery of efficient multisectoral humanitarian responses to the most affected areas. This complex situation has required innovative solutions, and strong preparedness for Emergency Response plans to enable effective, timely emergency responses to humanitarian crises. UNICEF, as the technical lead of the RRM, and through its support to the Government's response addressed needs generated by conflicts and floods. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of joint monitoring missions or humanitarian interventions in key UNICEF intervention areas
